arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Monaco 0-1 Paris FC: Sébastien Pocognoli loses for first time as ASM manager
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 11, 01/11/25 AS Monaco suffered their first defeat of the Sébastien Pocognoli era at the hands of Paris FC (1-0). Moses Simon’s goal proved to be…

arts.ttl: Paris FC predicted XI v Monaco: Jonathan Ikoné and Hamari Traoré out
arts.sum: Paris FC will be without Jonathan Ikoné and Hamari Traoré for the visit to face AS Monaco on Saturday afternoon. Both players, injured, have not been included in Paris FC’s…

arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v Paris FC: Caio Henrique returns, Paul Pogba out
arts.sum: AS Monaco will be without Paul Pogba on Saturday, but they will welcome back Caio Henrique when Paris FC visit the Principality. Pogba had been set to be included in…
